data.description: Data to forward to the screen. If `Pop Sceen` is selected, this data will be returned to the previous screen (this takes precedence over `target`)

action.description: What navigation action to take when pressed

target.description: The name of the screen used to perform the action. If `Pop Screen` is selected, this data will be returned to the previous screen.

screenType.description: The type of screen this navigation action will operate on

transition.description: The name of the transition animation to use for this action. If not provided, the default animation is used. If `Pop Screen` is selected, this field has no effect.
